LanguageData.VLW_AnimalBedNest.label: straw animal nest
LanguageData.VLW_AnimalBedNest.description: Straw nest for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.
LanguageData.VLW_AnimalBedStraw.label: straw animal bed
LanguageData.VLW_AnimalBedStraw.description: Straw bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.
